participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

reshist_addr1_leadrisk_poverty.Description: Percentage of individuals below -125 percent of poverty level in census tract of primary residential address

reshist_addr2_leadrisk_poverty.Description: Percentage of individuals below -125 percent of poverty level in census tract of secondary residential address

reshist_addr3_leadrisk_poverty.Description: Percentage of individuals below -125 percent of poverty level in census tract of tertiary residential address

reshist_addr1_leadrisk_housing.Description: Estimated percentage of homes at risk for lead exposure given lead-based paint in census tract of primary residential address

reshist_addr2_leadrisk_housing.Description: Estimated percentage of homes at risk for lead exposure given lead-based paint in census tract of secondary residential address

reshist_addr3_leadrisk_housing.Description: Estimated percentage of homes at risk for lead exposure given lead-based paint in census tract of tertiary residential address

reshist_addr1_leadrisk.Description: Estimated lead risk in census tract of primary residential address (1-10 scale)

reshist_addr2_leadrisk.Description: Estimated lead risk in census tract of secondary residential address (1-10 scale)

reshist_addr3_leadrisk.Description: Estimated lead risk in census tract of tertiary residential address (1-10 scale)
